record.creatorPhotographer: Martyn, Edward W.; Martyn's Maroon Studio
record.description: University of Chicago Baseball Team, 1905. Fourth row: Walter Herbert Eckersall, Fred Mitchell Walker, and Frank Herbert Templeton; third row: Amos Alonzo Stagg (coach), William Charles Speidal, Donald Putnam Abbott, and Floyd Everett Harper (assistant coach); second row: Arthur Paul, Jesse Claire Harper, and Stanley Ross Linn (captain); first row: Frederick Davis Hatfield, Frederick Rogers Baird, Ernest Wilson Miller, and Hugo Frank Bezdek.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Photo copy with original caption included. Mounted on board.
